We now return to our regularly scheduled programming. I reinstalled Regolith. Yes it’s based on Ubuntu 20.04. Today that’s a plus, since some proprietary tools I rely on have not been updated for 22.04. I feel like I have what I need in Linux with Homebrew over Regolith.
